entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
